description.title: Description
description.description: Abstract or Summary of the Project

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Based on Common Mission Areas from Federal Enterprise Architecture v2

describedBy.title: Described By
describedBy.description: URL to file that describes the data fields

bureauCode.title: Bureau Code
bureauCode.description: Federal agencies, list the primary program related to this data asset, from the Federal Program Inventory. Use the format of 015:001

rights.title: Rights
rights.description: This may include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies. This should also provide an explanation for the selected accessLevel including instructions for how to access a restricted file. May also be used for attribution or citation requirements

accessLevel.title: Access Level
accessLevel.description: The degree to which this dataset could be made publicly-available, regardless of whether it has been made available. Choices: public (Data asset is or could be made publicly available to all without restrictions), restricted public (Data asset is available under certain use restrictions), or non-public (Data asset is not available to members of the public)

rights.title: Rights
rights.description: This may include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies. This should also provide an explanation for the selected accessLevel including instructions for how to access a restricted file. May also be used for attribution or citation requirements

license.title: License
license.description: The license dataset or API is published with. See Open Licenses for more information

landingPage.title: Landing Page
landingPage.description: Link to the project website or page from the source Publisher

spatial.title: Spatial
spatial.description: lat, long (point) or x1, y1, x2, y2 (bounding box) in WGS-84 coordinate reference system

modified.title: Modified
modified.description: Date the Data was Last Modified

accrualPeriodicity.title: Frequency
accrualPeriodicity.description: Frequency with which dataset is published

dataQuality.title: Data Quality
dataQuality.description: Whether the dataset meets the agencyâ€™s Information Quality Guidelines (true/false)

isPartof.title: Collection
isPartof.description: The collection of which this dataset is a subset

parentUUID.title: isPartof
parentUUID.description: isPartof implies current dataset is a smaller/subset to a larger project or effort use Parent UUID or URI

references.title: Related Documents
references.description: Related documents such as technical information about a dataset, developer documentation, etc.

items.title: References
items.description: URL to Reference Documents or Websites

conformsTo.title: conformsTo
conformsTo.description: Human readable documentation on schema does not yet exist - only provided as an example

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: UUID are Globally Unique ID used to ensure stablity in referencing and identification of Projects
